name: Piano Tiles BTS 2019 - ARMY Love BTS
name_original: Piano Tiles BTS 2019 - ARMY Love BTS
description:
Hot Update
Welcome to BTS’s comeback with album Map of the soul: Persona and 7 new songs: Intro: Persona, Boy with Luv, Mikrokosmos, Make It Right, Home, Jamais Vu, Dionysus

BTS Rhythm Game - BTS Piano Tiles Finally Released!
Contains BTS songs
From BTS Debut Albums To Latest Albums! Play Them All!
Are you a fan of Super star BTS, you love BTS songs?
Your idols are Jungkook, jimin, jin, suga, J-hope, RM, V. Play this game NOW!
Collected songs to play :
Fake-Love , Best of me , 4 O'CLOCK, Young_Forever, DNA, Go Go , Save Me , Butterfly ,DOPE , Blood Sweat Tears, Love yourself , Serendipity, Just one day , Idol , Not today , Mic Drop, Boy In Luv , I need u ...

- Play your favorite BTS songs!
- Challenge your friends and beat their score!
- Strong power, ARMYs! This is the best app for international ARMYs to share our love and passion for BTS!

How to play:
- Touch the black piano piano several times to play the piano.
- Avoid white piano bricks!
- Simple to play, but hard to master.
- Getting all the black bricks in this high-speed music game is definitely not easy!

Game features:
- Excellent game design and flat graphics
- High quality KPOP piano music
- There is a large collection of KPOP piano songs
- Gaming experience smoother
- Collection of gems
- Add favorites
- Get experience, open new levels.
- 100% free music game
- You can share games and results
- 3 mini game about BTS: Popstar BTS Chibi, 2048 and Block Puzzle


DISCLAIMER
----------------------------------
This is an unofficial fan-made application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by BTS, their management teams, or their record labels.
